SELECT go_diagnosis.GO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, go_diagnosis.GO_TREAT_CODE, go_diagnosis.GO_DISEASE_CODE, go_diagnosis.GO_TREATMENT_WRITE_DATE, go_diagnosis.GO_DIAGNOSIS_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE, go_disease.GO_DISEASE_KOR, go_hospital.GO_HOSPITAL_NAME, go_hospital.GO_HOSPITAL_ADDRESS, go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NAME, go_doctor.GO_DOCTOR_NAME, go_treat_subject.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_NAME FROM go_diagnosis
JOIN go_treat ON go_diagnosis.GO_TREAT_CODE = go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE JOIN go_hospital ON go_treat.GO_HOSPITAL_ID = go_hospital.GO_HOSPITAL_ID JOIN go_doctor ON go_treat.GO_DOCTOR_ID = go_doctor.GO_DOCTOR_ID JOIN go_citizen ON go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_id = go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_id JOIN go_treat_subject ON go_doctor.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE = go_treat_subject.GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE JOIN go_disease ON go_diagnosis.GO_DISEASE_CODE = go_disease.GO_DISEASE_CODE WHERE go_diagnosis.GO_TREAT_CODE = #{treatCode}
